title: The Dark Knight
summary: A former criminal mastermind joins forces with a group of terrorists to destroy Gotham City, while Batman struggles to save the city.

title: Inception
summary: A skilled thief, who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets, is offered a chance to have his criminal record erased if he can successfully perform an inception.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Interstellar
summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary life story.
